text: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay is a 2008 American stoner comedy movie. It is the second movie in the Harold & Kumar series. It stars John Cho, Kal Penn, Paula Garc√©s, Neil Patrick Harris, Jon Reep, Rob Corddry and Ed Helms. It is directed/produced/written by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg. The movie was released on April 25, 2008 by Warner Bros. It received mixed reviews, but did well at the box office. The movie follows the event after Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle with Harold and Kumar flying to Amsterdam in the Netherlands. They are then imprisoned and end up on a series of misadventures when they escape from Guantanamo Bay. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2008 comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies set in Texas Category:2008 LGBT movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:2000s buddy comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies set in the Netherlands Category:Movies set in 2004 Category:New Line Cinema movies
title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
